title: Needs to happen. Dibble skin.
body:
Ever heard of Marcus Dibble? Me and my mates thought of a great skin for fizz, The Marcus Dibble, he could carry around a mop with his E could be him saying MOPPING FOR DAYS DAD, On his trident which has now become a mop. and at the end of it he says, Percy Inglis please respond, and his Alt could be a humpback whale coming out of the water and he could say "Cassidy Boon, please respond." and his W could be Dis calls for a Muzz, where his muzz boosts his basic's with magic damage, or muzz damage, you can do the rest, forgot my other plans, But
Riot
Please
Respond.

replies.body: Omg u have the best mid in the world. RIOT PLEASE RESPOND TO THIS MAN!!! Oh i couldnt stop laughing! xD Nice one mate

This guy just made my day, cant stop laughing. We need this so badly

His dance has to be the MUZZ :D
